divs: Sighting DetailsI was closing curtains in my bedroom to go to bed and noticed a slowly moving red light in the sky. It was a steady red light with nothing flashing from it and moving so slowly that I ruled out an air plane. It was much too high in the sky to be fireworks from festivities. I thought meteor but do meteors move so slowly??? Anyhow, my wife also witnessed it and we watched for about 3 minutes and it dissappeared either under the thick cloud cover or just vanished.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Guelph
There were no other sightings in Guelph on or around January 1st 2012
Summary: Red light moving slowly at 12:15 Jan 1 2012
